title: In process of transfer for 2 days...
body: Can you help me transfer  riot please.

replies.body: That's strange, and we'd like to take a look into this for you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see what happened and push the transfer forward.  If you already have a ticket, toss me the number and I'll check on the status for you!
